short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spice up your browsing! Some websites feature challenges where you can find good fortune. Get excited as you surf the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're looking for a way to add some excitement to your browsing experience or want to take a break from endlessly scrolling through websites, consider installing a browser extension. Occasionally, as you visit different websites, you may come across a challenge that presents an opportunity to find good fortune.
